description:
This course will teach you a lot of basic balloon decorating techniques and show you how these can be used to create professional looking balloon displays. You will be able to use these balloon d√©cor skills to create stunning displays at parties, weddings, business functions etc. Amaze your friends and family with these news skills and save on the expense of having to hire a professional.

Learn and master basic balloon decorating skills quickly with this comprehensive course.

  • Learn to build balloon bouquets, flowers, columns, arches
  • Learn to build both air filled and helium filled displays
  • Learn about balloon equipment and how to make your own.
  • Learn a lot of insider tips and advice to ensure success

Learn to create stunning balloon displays.

We will start with the basics showing you how to correctly fill and tie balloons, how to knot them into pairs and then form 4 clusters. You will then be shown how these basic building blocks can be used to build into various types of display. The lessons are broken down into short videos which are easy to follow. To get the most from this course you will need to get some balloons and practise what is shown in the lessons. There are over two hours of videos to watch on this course.

I have designed this course to be easily understood by complete beginners.

On completion of this course you should be able to work confidently with balloons and have a good selection of balloon decorations that you are able to build yourself.
title: Easy to learn basic Balloon Decorating for parties & events
